text: - My name is Ryan Broderson.

I lead a team of partner
development managers,
based in North America.
I've been in the partner organization
for the last five years.
Prior to AWS,
I spent 20 years in environmental branding
and manufacturing corporation,

where I led sales and
marketing for an organization.

The biggest surprise
in the first six months
was how collaborative the team was,

how willing they were to break
away from their daily grind
and help me learn and grow.
And it was a super supportive atmosphere,

and I'm excited to be
a part of it every day.
Five years into the role,
I have had the opportunity to learn
and be curious every month,

and really focused on
learning the technology.

But more importantly, how the
technology benefits business
and moves organizations and customers

to be able to achieve what
they're really looking for.
(upbeat music)
One of the most exciting parts of my job

is working with partners to
truly grow their business,
and specifically, their AWS practice.

We work with intern to
CEO on a daily basis.

So to be able to understand
from their perspective

how strategy and conversations
move their business

and how we can work together
to have them grow at a speed
they never could have imagined.

If you're interested in a fast
paced, exciting environment,
in which you can work daily with people
that help you show up as your best self,
then let's have a conversation.
(upbeat music)
